recipes.title: White Russian
recipes.author: Michael Clifford
recipes.description: The White Russian is among the best, easiest, and most popular vodka cocktails you will come across. The creamy counterpart to the equally famous Black Russian—vodka and coffee liqueur—the white version is incredibly simple to make by just adding cream to the black one.
steps: Pour the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, starting with the vodka, followed by the coffee liqueur. Add ice into the glass, and pour the cream in last.

recipes.title: Designated Appletini Mocktail

ingredients.label: granulted sugar
ingredients.value: a little granulted sugar, for rimming

ingredients.label: apple slices
ingredients.value: a few apple slices, for garnish

recipes.author: Colleen Graham
recipes.description: Whether you're the designated driver, don't feel like drinking, or simply want a great cocktail without the booze, the Designated Appletini is a perfect choice. It is a non-alcoholic version of the apple martini, also known as an appletini.
steps: Rim a chilled cocktail glass with the sugar.
Pour the apple juice, simple syrup, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with apple slices. Serve and enjoy.

recipes.title: Sundowner Mocktail
recipes.author: Amelia Hayes
recipes.description: The sundowner is an elegant mocktail with a fabulous flavor. It combines white grape juice and sparkling water. You also get to enjoy the cooling flavor of mint as the garnish slowly infuses its flavor into the drink.
steps: Pour the ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a sprig of mint. Serve and enjoy.
